channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump threatens Apple with 25% tariff: Is now a good time to buy an iPhone?
item.description: On Friday, President Donald Trump threatened Apple with 25% tariffs on any iPhone sold, but not made, in the U.S.

item.title: I’m hosting a Memorial Day barbecue. Would it be so bad to ask my guests to make financial contributions?
item.description: “I have a credit-card bill I’m trying to pay off, which just got bigger due to a broken shower.”

item.title: My daughter’s boyfriend, a guest in my home, offered to powerwash part of my house — then demanded money
item.description: “The amount was about what I would have paid to get the whole house done, and not just one side.’

item.title: Nvidia’s stock is losing steam, and this week’s earnings could underscore the risks
item.description: The chip stock snapped a four-week streak of gains. BofA analysts say this week’s earnings report could include “messy” guidance.

item.title: RoboForce introduces Titan mobile manipulator, brings in $5M more in funding

item.title: Beyond single-model AI: How architectural design drives reliable multi-agent orchestration
item.description: Successful AI agents require enterprises to orchestrate interactions, manage shared knowledge and plan for failure.

item.title: Astrobotic, WiBotic test lunar wireless charging system

item.title: The battle to AI-enable the web: NLweb and what enterprises need to know
item.description: Microsoft's NLWeb protocol transforms websites into AI-powered apps with conversational interfaces.

item.title: OpenAI updates Operator to o3, making its $200 monthly ChatGPT Pro subscription more enticing
item.description: Operator remains a research preview and is accessible only to ChatGPT Pro users. The Responses API version will continue to use GPT-4o.
